answers.answer: well i have experianced that and my doc put me on a medicine for anxiety i never knew i had and it helps me for the first few days i was tired anr now i am good. i will pray for her
thank you, its just so strange, they are running many tests from cat scans to a mri spinal tap.. but no answer

Wow..are you writing about me. This actually happened to me with my first child. I actually started to get the headaches in the hospital and it was awful but since this was my first child, I thought it was normal for me to feel this bad. I was home with him for two days when I collapsed in the bedroom with him in my arms onto the bed. See it hurt like hell to sit up..he had started cryn and I went to pick him up and fell out. I remember praying please let my husband come home cause I dont want to die cause than my baby would be by himself. Thank God he came home early. God id good. I was rushed to the Er and had a crazy high BP as well. I was hospitalized for over a week until they could regulate my BP..some said it was preeclampsia but after birth..some said they dont know. With my second child, my BP started to raise at a doc appt, they decided to induce me, knowing what happened last time, and I was given magensium sulfate and continued to recieve it after birth for 24 hrs. I couldnt have any visitors beside husband, no lights on in the room, I was like on a24hr ICU status. I felt much better this time around. Now with third kid, I was home two weeks and got so sick and feverish, put in hospital for 4 weeks..later determined I had lupus. Dont know if the lupus was the reason for the pregnancy. Hope this helps. This is over a six year time peiod. I now have a 10, 8 and 4 year old.

question: my daugher gave birth to her second child 1 week ago, she is in the hosp. again due to severe headaches and upon going found out her BP was also crazy high. they have ran test after test, no answers..what are they missing?
title: High blood pressure and headaches
